Name: Fail and Recover
Description: Demonstrates failure followed by strategic recovery and resolution.

Name: Error and Admission
Description: Shows accountability and transparency in owning and resolving mistakes.

Name: SCADA
Description: Involves SCADA/DCS systems, telemetry, or industrial control environments.

Name: Governance
Description: Highlights structured change management, release discipline, or ITIL-aligned workflows.

Name: Compliance
Description: Maps to regulatory frameworks such as NERC CIP, NRC 10 CFR 73.54, or FISMA/NIST.

Name: Mentorship
Description: Demonstrates coaching, team transformation, or legacy preservation for future engineers.

Name: Legacy Modernization
Description: Transforms legacy systems into modern, maintainable, and discoverable architectures.

Name: Telemetry Resilience
Description: Ensures fault tolerance and recovery in real-time data systems.

Name: Virtualization
Description: Involves physical-to-virtual migrations, Hyper-V, or OS-level boot recovery.

Name: Network Diagnostics
Description: Includes topology testing, switch/router troubleshooting, and infrastructure hardening.

Name: Rapid Response
Description: Shows urgency, creativity, and execution under time-sensitive conditions.

Name: Audit Ready
Description: Demonstrates traceability, rollback planning, and documentation for compliance.
